articles.title: An An, world’s oldest male panda in captivity, dies at 35
articles.description: The giant panda was a gift from the Chinese government to Hong Kong in 1999, and was kept at a theme park.
articles.content:
An An, the worlds oldest male giant panda in captivity, has died at the age of 35, the equivalent of 105 years old for a human.
